trans-unit.source: Represents a class that can read and write key identifiers, key identifier clauses, and security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 表示可以讀取和寫入金鑰識別碼、金鑰識別碼子句及安全性權杖的類別。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class to read and write <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> classes as XML.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> 類別，以 XML 的格式讀取和寫入 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause> 和 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class has methods to determine whether this class can read and write these entities and to actually read and write them.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> 類別有一些方法，可以判定這個類別是否能讀取和寫入這些實體 (Entity) 並實際加以讀取和寫入。

trans-unit.source: For security tokens, these methods are <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadToken%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteToken%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果要用於安全性權杖，這些方法是 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadToken%2A>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteToken%2A>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadToken%2A> 和 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteToken%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read the key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取金鑰識別碼的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this serializer can read the <see langword="<KeyIdentifier>" /> element referred to by the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 判定這個序列化程式是否能讀取指定之 XML 讀取器所參考的 <see langword="<KeyIdentifier>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when the specified <see langword="<KeyIdentifier>" /> XML element can be read; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以讀取指定的 <see langword="true" /> XML 項目，則為 <see langword="<KeyIdentifier>" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> 類別的類別必須覆寫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifier%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%2A> method.
<paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取金鑰識別碼子句的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this serializer can read a clause in a <see langword="<KeyIdentifier>" /> element referred to by the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 判定這個序列化程式是否能讀取指定之 XML 讀取器所參考 <see langword="<KeyIdentifier>" /> 項目中的子句。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when the specified key identifier clause can be read; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以讀取指定的金鑰識別碼子句，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> 類別的類別必須覆寫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClause%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%2A> method.
<paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取金鑰識別碼子句的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this serializer can read the <see langword="<KeyIdentifier>" /> element referred to by the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 判定這個序列化程式是否能讀取指定之 XML 讀取器所參考的 <see langword="<KeyIdentifier>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: Called by the base class.
<see langword="true" /> when the specified <see langword="<KeyIdentifier>" /> element can be read; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以讀取指定的 <see langword="true" /> 項目，則為 <see langword="<KeyIdentifier>" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> 類別的類別必須覆寫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClause%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%2A> method.
<paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read the key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取金鑰識別碼的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this serializer can read the <see langword="<KeyIdentifier>" /> element referred to by the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 判定這個序列化程式是否能讀取指定之 XML 讀取器所參考的 <see langword="<KeyIdentifier>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: Called by the base class.
<see langword="true" /> when the specified key identifier clause can be read; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以讀取指定的金鑰識別碼子句，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> 類別的類別必須覆寫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifier%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%2A> method.
<paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read the security token.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取安全性權杖的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this serializer can read the security token pointed at by the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 判定這個序列化程式是否能讀取指定之 XML 讀取器所指向的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when the security token can be read; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以讀取安全性權杖，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadTokenCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.

<paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read the security token.

trans-unit.source: Called by the base class.
<see langword="true" /> when the security token can be read; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

<paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier" /> that represents the key identifier to write.
Determines whether this serializer can write the specified key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 判定這個序列化程式是否可以寫入指定的金鑰識別碼。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when this serializer can write the specified key identifier; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個序列化程式可以寫入指定的金鑰識別碼，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

<paramref name="keyIdentifier" /> is <see langword="null" />.
A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> that represents the key identifier clause to write.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" />，表示要寫入的金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this serializer can write the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 判定這個序列化程式是否可以寫入指定的金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.target: 判定這個序列化程式是否可以寫入指定的金鑰識別碼。

The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" /> to convert to XML.
Determines whether this serializer can write the specified security token to XML.
trans-unit.target: 判定這個序列化程式是否可以將指定的安全性權杖寫入至 XML。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when the security token can be written; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
